A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Oh dear. Where to begin with this. Lets start at the beginning. Now Ep7 wasnt great it was a soft remake of Ep4 but JJ Abrams put just enough in that movie to keep the audience interested for Ep8

The return of Luke Skywalker
The mystery of Rey parentage
Who is Snoke
The Knights of Ren

All interesting talking points that we wanted to explore and be seen fleshed out over Ep8. What did we get ?

EVERYTHING flushed down the toilet.

The heroic Luke Skywalker now a scrooge like figure spending his day milking elephant tits. The truth of Rey parents is she a kenobi descent is she a skywalker is she the new force created being...Nope shes the bargining chip of some random drunks.

Snoke ? An anicent malevolent being who has been around for thousands of years in the shadows watching the rise and fall of the republic and empire jedi and sith. Killed off without any futher explanation of who he was or where he came from or what he was planning to do. Zero point to the character whatsoever.

Kylo Ren. Er...He takes his shirt off and has a lightsabre dance with Rey and hologram Luke.

Rian Johnson seems to have failed to realise that the episodic chapters should be linked to each other telling a continuing story within the existing SKYWALKER saga. The place to drop bloated new ideas is his new separate trilogy not here. JJ Abrams understood that the skywalker/jedi/sith theme was pivotal to the whole story and you cant move forward with providing satisfactory conclusion to the old characters arc.

What we got with The Last Jedi was a bloated mess that destroys what came before it and replaces it with a a mismash of new ideas none of which work well.

Not just a bad Star Wars movie. Its a bad movie period.
